content: I am currently working as an Android Developer in Zoho Corporation. I have completing my Bachelor's in SRM Easwari engineering college majoring in Computer Science and Engineering. I have a great interest in building apps and websites, and would like to explore more in the field of software.

I am always curious about the things I see and use, and I enjoy learning them. I like to work on projects out of my knowledge, so I could learn more while making new projects. I am looking forward to implementing and improving my skills in any opportunities that I pursue.

projects.title: Ecommerce Application
projects.description: An application that gets products data from Flipkart affiliate API and implements the ecommerce workflow with cart, wishlisting, and buying products.
points: Used retrofit and room db for network and database calls
Learned dependency injection using dagger along with many architectural patterns

projects.title: Code Database
projects.description: An application to store coding questions and track your progress on the road to become an expert programmer.
points: Implemented the MVT design pattern in Django, Python and designed the database with MySQL database.
A REST API is created using django-rest-framework to do CRUD operations on the website.
Created an Android app which consumes the hosted REST API for list, search and user login functionalities.
Hosted it in python-anywhere with MySQL database as an open-source app

projects.title: Digit Recognizer
projects.description: An app to predict hand-written digits drawn by user using deep learning. The project is done from scratch using numpy and pandas libraries in python.

projects.title: Dental Data Statistics
projects.description: An application to give a neat GUI for inserting, updating and displaying the data graphically and generating a report from the data given from a dental hospital. The app is currently being used by SRM dental hospital for tracking patient records.

projects.title: Tic-Tac-Toe AI
projects.description: The game tic-tac-toe for two player and single player - with AI created using minimax algorithm made using python.

projects.title: Minesweeper
projects.description: A strategic single-player game to flag the mines in the board with the clues about neighboring mines. It is created using python in an object-oriented design.

list.heading: Android Developer - Zoho Corporation
list.content: Worked on Zoho CRM mobile app, which is a popular customer interactions management app with a wide user base.

ol.title: Kotlin Multiplatform
ul: Created and implemented the base data layer of the CRM mobile app as a Kotlin Multiplatform library with network and database service for both android, iOS and mac platforms.
Followed best coding practices and enforced separation of concerns and unidirectional data flow.
Created the base for writing unit tests for the SDK and wrote unit tests for the custom filters feature in KMP
This SDK has cut down the development time by 50%, as a featureâ€™s backend only needs to be done once for both android and iOS platforms.

ol.title: Migration Tool
ul: Created a database migration tool which drafts SQL queries from XML schema definitions in compile time for all the platforms with common database structure.
The tool helped the team easily make changes and run migrations on the database and also reduced DB maintenance and testing work by 40%.

ol.title: Use Case Testing
ul: Created a base setup for writing Use Case Testing for different user interactions in the domain/backend layer which reduced the UI testing time by 80% which helped run tests in frequent iterations.
This testing framework is a data-driven testing framework which uses JUnit parameterised testing and MockK for testing and mocking data.
Implemented test cases for some features in CRM mobile using an internal Espresso library wrapper.

ol.title: Custom Filters
ul: Worked on framing SQL criteria from the filters set by the user to filter records along with android paging 3 to improve record loading speeds by 500 ms by supporting offline criteria resolution in mobile.

list.heading: Backend Developer Intern - Olcademy
ul: Solved many critical functional bugs on PHP and jQuery.
Transitioned major files from MySQL to MongoDB in a short period.

list.heading: Web Development
ul: CSS and
